text: The 2021 Welsh Conservatives leadership election took place on 23 January 2021. It happened after Paul Davies resigned from being leader of the Welsh Conservatives, after people saying that he had broken COVID-19 rules. After a short talk between people in the Welsh Conservatives, the group decided Andrew RT Davies should be the new leader. == References == Category:2021 elections in the United Kingdom Category:Conservative Party (UK)
title: 2021 Welsh Conservatives leadership election
